page.title: 15HALBERTON MILL
page.content: We went to{Halberton Mill,}and met the manager.18 years ago it was set up by 3 families,but today it is owned by Sheldon Jones PLC.They make cattle and poultry feeds and get grain and corn from local farmers and factories.They sell their products abroad and in desert areas,and to local farmers. There are 3 lorry drivers,6 mill workers, 2 secretaries and a manager. Lorries bring in raw material and are weighed.Materials are put into a grate and then a tank.The contents and the size of the pellets vary according to the size and the kind of animals. Then it is bagged and labelled. We thought the mill was smelly, dusty,dirty,noisy but not so that you had to put ear muffs on,and every so often,there would be a shower of pellets.The mill isn't very modern but can produce 500 bags an hour.
